name: courses
schema: CREATE TABLE "courses" (`course_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `duration_minutes` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `featured_order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `is_featured` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `is_free` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `level` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `logo` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `long_description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `materials_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `organization` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `price_usd` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `registration_active` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `registration_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `status` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `target_audience` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `website` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
